response.headline: Craft Cola cafe in Hyehwa, Seoul offers free taste testing and cola syrup bottles for unique Korean food experience
response.summary: Craft Cola cafe in Hyehwa, Seoul features free taste testing and cola syrup bottles for sale. May Lee recommends it as the perfect souvenir you won't find in tourist shops, calling it a local hidden spot for Seoul food adventures.

extracted_text: Tag your travel buddy and don't skip this local hidden spot on your Seoul food adventure!
Follow @_themayway_ for more fun Korean food experiences!
objects: Craft cola logo with spiky-haired character
